dc:description: Built in 1923 by Smith, Hinchman & Grylls Associates, this structure  was designed for indoor track events and intercollegiate sports, particularly football, baseball, basketball, and track athletics. Originally named the Yost Field House after U-M football coach Fielding Harris Yost (1921-1941), the building was  remodeled in November of 1973 and renamed Yost Ice Arena.

dc:memberOf.title: Bentley Image Bank, Bentley Historical Library
